item.title: Code
item.description: Code Block Examples Code block language examples Go package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("hello world") } HTML <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <body> <h1>My First Heading</h1> <p>My first paragraph.</p> </body> </html> Markdown # H1 heading **Some bold text** *Italic text example*

item.title: Mermaid
item.description: Flowchart flowchart LR A[Hard] -->|Text| B(Round) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result 1] C -->|Two| E[Result 2] Sequence diagram sequenceDiagram Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John->>John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts! John-->>Alice: Great! John->>Bob: How about you? Bob-->>John: Jolly good! Gnatt Chart gantt section Section Completed :done, des1, 2014-01-06,2014-01-08 Active :active, des2, 2014-01-07, 3d Parallel 1 : des3, after des1, 1d Parallel 2 : des4, after des1, 1d Parallel 3 : des5, after des3, 1d Parallel 4 : des6, after des4, 1d Class diagram classDiagram Class01 <|-- AveryLongClass : Cool <<interface>> Class01 Class09 --> C2 : Where am i?
